content.text: Learn how to create a split screen (50/50) with CSS.
content.html: Learn how to create a split screen (50/50) with CSS.

content.text: How To Create A Split Screen

content.code:
Jane Flex

   

Some text.

 
 
       

John Doe

   

Some text here too.
content.code_html:
<div class="split left">
  <div class="centered">
    <img src="img_avatar2.png" alt="Avatar woman">
    <h2>Jane Flex</h2>
    <p>Some text.</p>
  </div>
</div>

<div class="split right">
  <div class="centered">
    <img src="img_avatar.png" alt="Avatar man">
    <h2>John Doe</h2>
    <p>Some text here too.</p>
  </div>
</div>

content.code_html:
/* Split the screen in half */
.split {
  height: 100%;
  width: 50%;
  position: fixed;
  z-index: 1;
  top: 0;
  overflow-x: hidden;
  padding-top: 20px;
}

/* Control the left side */
.left {
  left: 0;
  background-color: #111;
}

/* Control the right side */
.right {
  right: 0;
  background-color: red;
}

/* If you want the content centered horizontally and vertically */
.centered {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  text-align: center;
}

/* Style the image inside the centered container, if needed */
.centered img {
  width: 150px;
  border-radius: 50%;
}
